argument.name: <ImageResource>
argument.description: An ImageResource object created by the ImageResource.Get() method.

page.description: Gets the bitmap alias dictionary, for directly translating bitmap aliases. The <ImageResource>.GetBitmapNameMap() method returns an ImageName object.
page.example: dim ir as P dim nm as P ir = ImageResource.get() nm = ir.GetBitmapNameMap() nm.Initialize(<<%str% a5_control:browse=$a5_browse %str%) ui_dlg_box("","{image=a5_control:browse}")
